descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Myles Turner swats James Harden's shot off the glass.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Myles Turner elevates for the bigtime block) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Myles Turner elevates for the block on Harden

videos.description: Domantas Sabonis passes to Chris Duarte, who finishes with a layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Domantas Sabonis makes a sweet dime) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Sabonis hits a cutting Duarte for the lay-in

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (James Harden drains 3-point shot vs. Indiana Pacers) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: James Harden drains 3-point shot vs. Indiana Pacers

videos.description: Kevin Durant loses Torrey Craig with a step-back move, then knocks down the trey to the delight of the bench.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nets bench goes wild on KD's ankle-breaking 3) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nets bench goes wild on KD's ankle-breaking 3

videos.description: James Harden sets up Bruce Brown twice early in the third quarter for a pair of buckets near the basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Harden finds Bruce Brown for a pair of assists) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harden finds Bruce Brown for a pair of assists

videos.description: Myles Turner rises for the dunk attempt, but LaMarcus Aldridge wins the battle of former Texas big men with a big block.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Aldridge swats Turner at the rim) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Aldridge swats Turner at the rim

videos.description: Kevin Durant and Steve Nash can't help but smile after the Nets star chucks the ball into the crowd after drawing a foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KD gets T'd up for hurling ball into crowd) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: KD gets T'd up for hurling ball into crowd
